decks.notes: This deck focuses on generating card advantage and disrupting the opponent through a combination of control elements and unconventional threats. It utilizes cards like Rakdos Charm, Darkness, and Batwing Brume to protect itself and deny the opponent's strategies. The combo aspect of the deck comes from the interaction between Trespasser's Curse and Hunted Phantasm, which effectively punishes the opponent for playing creatures while providing the player with card advantage. The inclusion of cards like Inquisition of Kozilek and Force of Negation further enhances the deck's disruptive capabilities.

The crucial idea behind this deck is to efficiently ramp up mana using cards such as Simic Growth Chamber and Amulet of Vigor, allowing for explosive plays with Primeval Titan and Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle. By utilizing the unique land bouncing abilities of cards like Selesnya Sanctuary and Tolaria West, the deck can generate an overwhelming board presence quickly. The combination of fast mana acceleration and powerful threats like Dryad of the Ilysian Grove creates a potent combo strategy that can overwhelm opponents in the Modern 1 vs 1 format.

This Bant Control deck focuses on utilizing powerful planeswalkers, counterspells, and removal to control the game and outvalue the opponent. The deck aims to interact with the opponent's threats using a combination of countermagic, removal spells, and creatures with flash. By constantly disrupting the opponent's game plan and generating card advantage through cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Jace, the Mind Sculptor, the deck can take control of the game and win through incremental advantage. Additionally, Ephemerate and Eternal Witness provide additional value and recursion options.

This Aggro - Cascade Crash deck focuses on using Cascade spells like Crashing Footfalls and Violent Outburst to continually put pressure on the opponent. The deck also utilizes the Cascade ability of Shardless Agent to cast powerful spells for free. With creatures like Bonecrusher Giant and Brazen Borrower, as well as control elements like Force of Negation and Cryptic Command, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly while still maintaining some level of interaction and disruption.

This deck is focused on casting spells with Cascade to overwhelm the opponent quickly. By cascading into powerful spells like Crashing Footfalls and Violent Outburst, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early on. The deck includes a mix of counterspells, tempo plays, and card advantage to control the game while constantly pushing its aggressive game plan. Utilizing cards like Shardless Agent and Subtlety to cascade into impactful spells, the deck seeks to outpace and outmaneuver the opponent to secure a swift victory.

The deck focuses on utilizing creatures with abilities that complement each other to assemble a powerful combo quickly. It includes cards that allow for creature tutoring, reanimation, and protection to help execute the combo efficiently. The key idea is to continuously search for specific creatures to create a toolbox of options that can be used for combo pieces or disruption. With Lurrus of the Dream-Den as a companion, the deck aims to consistently bring out the right creatures at the right time to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.

This deck aims to dominate the game by controlling the opponent's plays through a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and planeswalkers. It focuses on gaining card advantage, disrupting opponent's strategies, and eventually winning with powerful threats like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Celestial Colonnade. The deck also utilizes a variety of lands to ensure mana consistency and flexibility in casting spells. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to establish control over the game and dictate the pace of play until victory is achieved.

This Esper Control deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy through a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and planeswalkers. By efficiently controlling the board and leveraging card advantage with cards like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and Jace, the Mind Sculptor, the deck aims to outlast and outvalue its opponents. The inclusion of cards like Bitterblossom and Kaya's Guile provide additional utility and flexibility in dealing with various threats. Overall, the deck aims to maintain control of the game and grind out a win through incremental advantage.

The deck revolves around using a combination of cards to quickly draw through the deck to find key pieces like Jace, Wielder of Mysteries, Thassa's Oracle, and Inverter of Truth to win the game. The deck also includes cards like Pact of Negation, Phyrexian Unlife, and Angel's Grace to protect yourself while setting up your win condition. The mana base is designed to ensure you can cast your spells efficiently and consistently, with cards like Serum Visions and Sleight of Hand to help with card selection. The goal is to quickly assemble your combo pieces and win the game before your opponent can stop you.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly swarm the battlefield with goblin creatures and use them to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive attacks. The deck utilizes cards like Aether Vial and Pyre of Heroes to cheat out goblin creatures quickly. Conspicuous Snoop allows you to copy powerful abilities from the top of your deck, while cards like Munitions Expert and Sling-Gang Lieutenant provide removal and direct damage options. The deck also includes key goblin lords like Goblin Chieftain and Goblin Warchief to boost the power of your goblin army and push through for victory.

The deck focuses on quickly deploying a board of aggressive human creatures while disrupting the opponent's game plan with Meddling Mage and Thalia's Lieutenant. Aether Vial allows for instant-speed creature deployment, while cards like Noble Hierarch and Thalia, Guardian of Thraben provide additional utility. Reflector Mage and Unsettled Mariner provide tempo swings and protection for the creatures, ensuring that the deck can maintain pressure on the opponent throughout the game. The mana base and creature selection are optimized to ensure consistent early aggression and disruptive capabilities.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on efficient disruption and aggression, utilizing cards like Thoughtseize, Inquisition of Kozilek, and Unholy Heat to disrupt the opponent's game plan while deploying threats like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, Dragon's Rage Channeler, and Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger to quickly pressure the opponent. The inclusion of Lurrus of the Dream-Den as a companion allows for recurring threats and incremental value, ensuring a relentless assault on the opponent's resources and life total. The mana base is designed to support the deck's aggressive game plan while providing consistency in casting spells.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by utilizing cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Remand to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck aims to ramp up mana quickly using cards like Elvish Reclaimer and Dryad of the Ilysian Grove, eventually winning the game with a powerful Scapeshift combo to deal massive damage with Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle. The inclusion of Bring to Light allows for flexibility in finding key cards, while Supreme Verdict provides a board wipe option when needed. This deck excels at out-grinding opponents and taking over the game with its versatile control elements.

The deck focuses on utilizing The Underworld Cookbook as a key engine to generate card advantage while also fueling the graveyard for value. It aims to quickly ramp into powerful threats like Feasting Troll King and Asmoranomardicadaistinaculdacar, supported by Urza's Saga and Trail of Crumbs for additional consistency. The deck also runs a few control elements like Bone Shards and Pithing Needle to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the strategy revolves around aggressive play and resource management to overwhelm the opponent.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy with cards like Blood Moon and Pillage while ramping up mana using Utopia Sprawl and Arbor Elf. It also includes removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Unholy Heat to control the board. Karn, the Great Creator provides versatile utility, while Wrenn and Six offer card advantage. The deck aims to control the game until it can play powerful threats like Glorybringer and Klothys, God of Destiny. Bloodbraid Elf and Seasoned Pyromancer provide additional value while maintaining pressure on the opponent.
